TopicTitle: Scaling & Bugs on High DPI Displays

Articles.Content:
Hi,

i tested ksp today on my new Lenovo Thinkpad P50 (15" 4k display Nvidia Quadro m1000m).

The option to scale the ui top 150% wasnt enough so i canged the settings.cfg to use 250%.

I found some glitches during play:

  • Artificial horizon has "transparent" area in the middle
  • Hight in top middle isnt displayed (no numbers)
  • top right buttons for vessel stats etc. are still 100% (so theyre not resized)
  • Thrust and gmeter are very blurry
  • loading indicator is clipping out off the screen / cut off (bottom right)
  • balistic courves arent resized so next to invisible
  • initial loadinscreen for the game is tiny (i guess settings arent loaded & applied at that stage)

 

Question: is there a way (in windows) to detect the os ui scale and auto apply it to the game (adjusting the scaling on tiny menus is hard)

 

my suggestion: buy some lucky employee that notebook so you can test it

 

i made some screenshots but dont know how to attach them without uploading them to my webspace
